entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 04:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
